Just enjoyed a lovely meal here with my family whilst on vacation. Stopped by yesterday night and made a quick reservation for tonight, when we arrived we were welcomed back and given great service. Everyone enjoyed their meals- see the pics for how beautiful it all was. The ceviche and cookie desert were my favorite with lovely flowery ice cream. Seafood paella was perfect, not over cooked and mushy like it can be. My mother enjoyed the lasagna, and my brother and father enjoyed their respective meats. The restaurant design and layout is very unique- don't miss the underground skeleton!
